document_data.name: Silvershield
document_data.mainbody: '''Silvershield''' was a powerful [[patriar]] family of [[Baldur's Gate]].
document_data.Activities: Fabulously wealthy, the Silvershields lived a life of extravagant luxury as they subtly worked their influence on the political scene of Baldur's Gate.
document_data.Base of Operations: [[Silvershield estate]], located on the western edge of the [[Baldur's Gate/Upper City|Upper City]], was considered the grandest of all the city's noble manors.
document_data.History: The Silvershield family rose to prominence at some point in the 1300s [[DR]]. Before long, they were represented on Baldur's Gate's [[Council of Four]], a tradition that went on nearly unbroken until the late 15{{th}} century.

Notable Members.14{{th}} century:
* [[Entar Silvershield]], Grand Duke of Baldur's Gate
* [[Skie Silvershield]], Entar's daughter who took up the life of an adventurer
* [[Eddard Silvershield]], the deceased son of Entar
Notable Members.15{{th}} century:
* [[Alana Silvershield]], a member of the family in the late 15{{th}} century DR.
* [[Torlin Silvershield]], High Artificer of [[Gond]], Duke of Baldur's Gate, and [[Chosen]] of [[Bhaal]]
* An unknown Silvershield was the third husband of [[Olivine Ambergul]], before she poisoned him.
